# Module: tf.spectral



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/spectral_ops.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/ops/spectral_ops.py).

Spectral operators (e.g. DCT, FFT, RFFT).


## Functions

[`dct(...)`](../tf/spectral/dct): Computes the 1D [Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT)][dct] of `input`.

[`fft(...)`](../tf/fft): Fast Fourier transform.

[`fft2d(...)`](../tf/fft2d): 2D fast Fourier transform.

[`fft3d(...)`](../tf/fft3d): 3D fast Fourier transform.

[`ifft(...)`](../tf/ifft): Inverse fast Fourier transform.

[`ifft2d(...)`](../tf/ifft2d): Inverse 2D fast Fourier transform.

[`ifft3d(...)`](../tf/ifft3d): Inverse 3D fast Fourier transform.

[`irfft(...)`](../tf/spectral/irfft): Inverse real-valued fast Fourier transform.

[`irfft2d(...)`](../tf/spectral/irfft2d): Inverse 2D real-valued fast Fourier transform.

[`irfft3d(...)`](../tf/spectral/irfft3d): Inverse 3D real-valued fast Fourier transform.

[`rfft(...)`](../tf/spectral/rfft): Real-valued fast Fourier transform.

[`rfft2d(...)`](../tf/spectral/rfft2d): 2D real-valued fast Fourier transform.

[`rfft3d(...)`](../tf/spectral/rfft3d): 3D real-valued fast Fourier transform.
